title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

1. The user is navigating the app from the
- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The User attempts to launch video playback for a game from a game tile, MLB.tv button, or Games EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe a paywall

AND

1. The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

1. The user will be sent to the Games EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

1. The user can select the game for immediate video playback

title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

1. The user is navigating the app from the
- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The User attempts to launch audio playback for a game from a game tile, Audio button, or Audio EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe a paywall

AND

1. The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

1. The user will be sent to the Audio EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

1. The user can select the game for immediate audio playback

title: Apple TV+ Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. A game is broadcasted on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the following areas:
- Games segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now games carousel on Watch tab
- Scoreboard on Scores tab
- Scoreboard on Home tab
- Scoreboard on Team page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe the Apple TV+ logo

AND

1. For non-Watch Now tiles, the Apple TV+ logo will not be displayed

AND

1. "Watch on Apple TV+" or "Live on Apple TV+" copy will be available

AND

1. The Apple TV+ logo will be displayed on the game tile and hero image on the Watch Now segment

title: Apple TV+ Blackout Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has attempted to launch a game that is streaming on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Apple TV blackout message
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The copy will read, " "

title: Apple TV+ Deeplink Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. An Apple TV+ game is live in the Apple TV app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the game tile or mlb.tv link for an exclusive Friday Night Apple TV+ game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be asked if they would like to leave the MLB app and navigate to Apple TV

AND

1. If yes, the user will be deeplinked to the proper MLB section of the Apple TV app

AND

1. The user can watch the MLB game on the Apple TV app without issues

title: Successful Purchase of MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

1. The user selects an MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

1. The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

1. The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful game playback.

title: Successful Purchase of At Bat Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

1. The user selects an At Bat Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

1. The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

1. The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful audio playback.

title: Conviva Tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is playing back a live, archive, or non-game content 

AND

+ The user is utilizing a proxy software (Charles, Proxyman)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user reviews the return call in proxy for their current stream

EX:![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374096)
https://268a2000018370f5f35b29272d1942aa2ff7b6a9.ipv4.cws.conviva.com
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe Conviva tags in the contents, response section are properly being generated

EX: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374095)

title: Conviva Tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is playing back a live, archive, or non-game content 

AND

+ The user is utilizing a proxy software (Charles, Proxyman)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user reviews the Adobe return in proxy for their current stream

EX: http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374097)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe Adobe tags in the contents, header section (Filter by Form) are properly being generated

EX: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374098)

title: Ad Drop
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their current live playback session

AND 

+ The custom events for ad breaks should be generated

title: Launching VOD
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their VOD session

AND 

+ The custom events for pre-roll ads are generated

title: Ad Breaks
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their current archived playback session

AND 

+ The custom events for ad breaks should be generated

When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the home team

ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Phillies @ Mets
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

and the scrubber should now be white (if app is in dark mode) or black (if app is in light mode)
and the LIVE button should now be highlighted white (if app is in dark mode) or black (if app is in light mode)
